channel.title: crypto on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in crypto on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Aave Logo
Aave is a non-custodial money market protocol Users of the Aave protocol can participate as both depositors and borrowers. Depositors provide liquidity to the market to earn passive income, while borrowers are able to borrow using either a stable or variable interest rate. Holders of the AAVE token can participate in governance of the protocol. Check out the chart above to get historical and live Aave price data, then use the buy/sell button to start trading.
You can download theAavelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Aave
item.description: Aave is a non-custodial money market protocol Users of the Aave protocol can participate as both depositors and borrowers. Depositors provide liquidity to the market to earn passive income, while borrowers are able to borrow using either a stable or variable interest rate. Holders of the AAVE token can participate in governance of the protocol. Check out the chart above to get historical and live Aave price data, then use the buy/sell button to start trading.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Algorand Logo
Algorand is a proof-of-stake blockchain that eliminates the possibility of hard forks The Algorand platform allows users to create tokens and dApps using a unique “pure proof-of-stake” consensus mechanism that, unlike other PoS systems, requires no “bonding” period. Algorand is also the first blockchain to provide immediate transaction finality, removing the risk of forking. Source
You can download theAlgorandlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Algorand
item.description: Algorand is a proof-of-stake blockchain that eliminates the possibility of hard forks The Algorand platform allows users to create tokens and dApps using a unique “pure proof-of-stake” consensus mechanism that, unlike other PoS systems, requires no “bonding” period. Algorand is also the first blockchain to provide immediate transaction finality, removing the risk of forking. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Augur Logo
Augur is a decentralized prediction market platform built on the Ethereum blockchain. Augur is developed by Forecast Foundation, which was founded in 2014 by Jack Peterson, Joey Krug, and Jeremy Gardner. Forecast Foundation is advised by Ron Bernstein, founder of now-defunct company Intrade, and Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin. Source
You can download theAugurlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Augur
item.description: Augur is a decentralized prediction market platform built on the Ethereum blockchain. Augur is developed by Forecast Foundation, which was founded in 2014 by Jack Peterson, Joey Krug, and Jeremy Gardner. Forecast Foundation is advised by Ron Bernstein, founder of now-defunct company Intrade, and Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Basic Attention Token Logo
Basic Attention Token powers the first blockchain based digital advertising platform Basic Attention Token (BAT) is an Ethereum-based cryptocurrency that is exchanged between publishers, advertisers and consumers in an effort to improve digital marketing efficiency and prevent billions of dollars worth of fraud that takes place each year. The Basic Attention Token is used on the Brave browser (brave.com) to reward users for viewing ads. Publishers also receive BAT in the form of ad revenue for users consuming their content.
You can download theBasic Attention Tokenlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Basic Attention Token
item.description: Basic Attention Token powers the first blockchain based digital advertising platform Basic Attention Token (BAT) is an Ethereum-based cryptocurrency that is exchanged between publishers, advertisers and consumers in an effort to improve digital marketing efficiency and prevent billions of dollars worth of fraud that takes place each year. The Basic Attention Token is used on the Brave browser (brave.com) to reward users for viewing ads. Publishers also receive BAT in the form of ad revenue for users consuming their content.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Bitcoin Cash Logo Bitcoin Cash is a cryptocurrency that is a fork of Bitcoin. Bitcoin Cash is a spin-off or altcoin that was created in 2017. In November 2018, Bitcoin Cash split into two cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin Cash and Bitcoin SV. Bitcoin Cash is sometimes also referred to as Bcash. Source
You can download theBitcoin Cashlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Bitcoin Cash
item.description: Bitcoin Cash is a cryptocurrency that is a fork of Bitcoin. Bitcoin Cash is a spin-off or altcoin that was created in 2017. In November 2018, Bitcoin Cash split into two cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin Cash and Bitcoin SV. Bitcoin Cash is sometimes also referred to as Bcash. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Chainlink Logo
Chainlink is a decentralized oracle that provides external data to smart contracts Using reputation and validation systems to reward honest behavior among tamper-proof oracles, the Chainlink network connects smart contracts to real world data, events and payments. The cryptocurrency that powers the network is LINK, an ERC-20 token that incentivizes oracles - third party blockchain data sources - to maintain service level agreement (SLA) standards. Check out the chart above to get historical and live Chainlink price data, then use the buy/sell button to start trading.
You can download theChainlinklogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Chainlink
item.description: Chainlink is a decentralized oracle that provides external data to smart contracts Using reputation and validation systems to reward honest behavior among tamper-proof oracles, the Chainlink network connects smart contracts to real world data, events and payments. The cryptocurrency that powers the network is LINK, an ERC-20 token that incentivizes oracles - third party blockchain data sources - to maintain service level agreement (SLA) standards. Check out the chart above to get historical and live Chainlink price data, then use the buy/sell button to start trading.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Compound Logo
Compound lets you earn interest on various cryptocurrencies Built on the Ethereum blockchain, the Compound protocol establishes money markets which algorithmically derive interest rates based on the supply and demand of different cryptocurrencies. This allows suppliers and borrowers of a given asset to earn or pay a floating interest rate without having to negotiate terms with a peer or counterparty. Source
You can download theCompoundlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Compound
item.description: Compound lets you earn interest on various cryptocurrencies Built on the Ethereum blockchain, the Compound protocol establishes money markets which algorithmically derive interest rates based on the supply and demand of different cryptocurrencies. This allows suppliers and borrowers of a given asset to earn or pay a floating interest rate without having to negotiate terms with a peer or counterparty. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 ATOM Logo
Cosmos is the internet of blockchains Cosmos is a decentralized ecosystem of blockchains that can scale and interoperate. The goal of Cosmos is to make it easy for developers to build separate blockchains that can interact with each other - essentially forming an internet of blockchains that are networked together. ATOM is the native staking token associated with Cosmos Hub, the first of thousands of interconnected blockchains. Check out the chart above to get historical and live Cosmos price data, then use the buy/sell button to start trading.
You can download theCosmoslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Cosmos
item.description: Cosmos is the internet of blockchains Cosmos is a decentralized ecosystem of blockchains that can scale and interoperate. The goal of Cosmos is to make it easy for developers to build separate blockchains that can interact with each other - essentially forming an internet of blockchains that are networked together. ATOM is the native staking token associated with Cosmos Hub, the first of thousands of interconnected blockchains. Check out the chart above to get historical and live Cosmos price data, then use the buy/sell button to start trading.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Curve DAO Token Logo
Curve is a liquidity pool for stable coins Curve awards the CRV token to users who provide liquidity to their pools. Traders then use the pooled funds to exchange different stable coins, avoiding slippage and high fees. Source
You can download theCurve DAOlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Curve DAO
item.description: Curve is a liquidity pool for stable coins Curve awards the CRV token to users who provide liquidity to their pools. Traders then use the pooled funds to exchange different stable coins, avoiding slippage and high fees. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Dai Logo
Dai (or DAI) is a stablecoin cryptocurrency which aims to keep its value as close to one United States dollar (USD) as possible through an automated system of smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. Dai is maintained and regulated by MakerDAO, a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) composed of the owners of its governance token, MKR, who may vote on changes to certain parameters in its smart contracts in order to ensure the stability of Dai.
You can download theDailogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Dai
item.description: Dai (or DAI) is a stablecoin cryptocurrency which aims to keep its value as close to one United States dollar (USD) as possible through an automated system of smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain. Dai is maintained and regulated by MakerDAO, a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) composed of the owners of its governance token, MKR, who may vote on changes to certain parameters in its smart contracts in order to ensure the stability of Dai.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Filecoin Logo
Filecoin (⨎) is an open-source, public, cryptocurrency and digital payment system intended to be a blockchain-based cooperative digital storage and data retrieval method. It is made by Protocol Labs and builds on top of InterPlanetary File System, allowing users to rent unused hard drive space. A blockchain mechanism is used to register the deals. Source
You can download theFilecoinlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Filecoin
item.description: Filecoin (⨎) is an open-source, public, cryptocurrency and digital payment system intended to be a blockchain-based cooperative digital storage and data retrieval method. It is made by Protocol Labs and builds on top of InterPlanetary File System, allowing users to rent unused hard drive space. A blockchain mechanism is used to register the deals. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Gnosis Logo
Gnosis is an Ethereum-based prediction market protocol Gnosis enables users to trade cryptocurrencies that are representative of events. As the outcome of these events become clear, Gnosis tokens gain or lose value depending on what was predicted by the user. GNO tokens are staked in order to pay the fees associated with the platform. Source
You can download theGnosislogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Gnosis
item.description: Gnosis is an Ethereum-based prediction market protocol Gnosis enables users to trade cryptocurrencies that are representative of events. As the outcome of these events become clear, Gnosis tokens gain or lose value depending on what was predicted by the user. GNO tokens are staked in order to pay the fees associated with the platform. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
ICON Logo
The ICON network connects blockchain products with established institutions in the real world ICON is a decentralized network seeking to connect blockchain communities that were previously independent. Anyone in the world can now create a blockchain project, participate in the ICON network and interact with existing communities comprised of reputable institutions like banks, securities, hospitals, universities and more. The cryptocurrency used for real-time payments within the ICON network is ICX.
You can download theICONlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: ICON
item.description: The ICON network connects blockchain products with established institutions in the real world ICON is a decentralized network seeking to connect blockchain communities that were previously independent. Anyone in the world can now create a blockchain project, participate in the ICON network and interact with existing communities comprised of reputable institutions like banks, securities, hospitals, universities and more. The cryptocurrency used for real-time payments within the ICON network is ICX.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Kusama Logo
Kusama is an experimental test environment based on Polkadot’s codebase Created by the same team that deployed Polkadot, Kusama is a testing ground for developers that hold the KSM token and want to build and deploy a parachain or try out Polkadot’s governance, staking, nomination and validation functionality in a real environment. Source
You can download theKusamalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Kusama
item.description: Kusama is an experimental test environment based on Polkadot’s codebase Created by the same team that deployed Polkadot, Kusama is a testing ground for developers that hold the KSM token and want to build and deploy a parachain or try out Polkadot’s governance, staking, nomination and validation functionality in a real environment. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Kyber Network Logo
Kyber Network is a decentralized liquidity protocol used for token swaps Kyber allows for instant token exchanges for any decentralized application (dapp) without the need for an intermediary. Kyber Network Crystal (KNC), the first deflationary staking token, plays a critical role in the network, allowing owners to earn staking rewards and voting rights on the protocol. Source
You can download theKyber Networklogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Kyber Network
item.description: Kyber Network is a decentralized liquidity protocol used for token swaps Kyber allows for instant token exchanges for any decentralized application (dapp) without the need for an intermediary. Kyber Network Crystal (KNC), the first deflationary staking token, plays a critical role in the network, allowing owners to earn staking rewards and voting rights on the protocol. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Nano Logo Nano (NANO), formerly RaiBlocks (XRB), is a peer-to-peer digital currency. It is a decentralized, open-source cryptocurrency based on directed acyclic graph (DAG) architecture, and released under the FreeBSD License. It operates without intermediaries by utilizing a distributed ledger with a block-lattice data structure. Nano was launched in October 2015 by Colin LeMahieu, with the aim of addressing blockchain scalability limitations that can result in restrictive fees and increased transaction confirmation times under load.
You can download theNanologo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Nano
item.description: Nano (NANO), formerly RaiBlocks (XRB), is a peer-to-peer digital currency. It is a decentralized, open-source cryptocurrency based on directed acyclic graph (DAG) architecture, and released under the FreeBSD License. It operates without intermediaries by utilizing a distributed ledger with a block-lattice data structure. Nano was launched in October 2015 by Colin LeMahieu, with the aim of addressing blockchain scalability limitations that can result in restrictive fees and increased transaction confirmation times under load.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
OmiseGO Logo
The OmiseGo network enables instant transactions in real-time for financial services OmiseGO (OMG) is a global platform for open financial services that enables transparent, peer-to-peer transactions in real-time across multiple blockchains, geographies and applications. The cryptocurrency that powers OmiseGO is the OMG token, which is based on Ethereum’s ERC-20 standard. OmiseGO also provides a white labeled eWallet designed for businesses that can be used to digitize and store assets, pay for goods and services or receive payments from customers.
You can download theOmiseGOlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: OmiseGO
item.description: The OmiseGo network enables instant transactions in real-time for financial services OmiseGO (OMG) is a global platform for open financial services that enables transparent, peer-to-peer transactions in real-time across multiple blockchains, geographies and applications. The cryptocurrency that powers OmiseGO is the OMG token, which is based on Ethereum’s ERC-20 standard. OmiseGO also provides a white labeled eWallet designed for businesses that can be used to digitize and store assets, pay for goods and services or receive payments from customers.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Polkadot Logo Polkadot is a heterogeneous multi-chain interchange and translation architecture which enables customised side-chains to connect with public blockchains. Blockchains can exchange messages in a secure and trust-free manner with Polkadot. The protocol was created by the Ethereum co-founder Gavin Wood, and raised $144.3 million in its Initial Coin Offering in October 2017. Source
You can download thePolkadotlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Polkadot
item.description: Polkadot is a heterogeneous multi-chain interchange and translation architecture which enables customised side-chains to connect with public blockchains. Blockchains can exchange messages in a secure and trust-free manner with Polkadot. The protocol was created by the Ethereum co-founder Gavin Wood, and raised $144.3 million in its Initial Coin Offering in October 2017. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Qtum Logo
Qtum is a hybrid platform that combines elements of both Bitcoin and Ethereum Qtum was the first to combine the value transfer functionality of Bitcoin (BTC) and the smart contract support of Ethereum (ETH) into a single platform. This allows users to build applications running on a blockchain, while also allowing their creations to transact in a way that’s similar to Bitcoin. The QTUM cryptocurrency is used to pay fees and provide governance on the platform.
You can download theQtumlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Qtum
item.description: Qtum is a hybrid platform that combines elements of both Bitcoin and Ethereum Qtum was the first to combine the value transfer functionality of Bitcoin (BTC) and the smart contract support of Ethereum (ETH) into a single platform. This allows users to build applications running on a blockchain, while also allowing their creations to transact in a way that’s similar to Bitcoin. The QTUM cryptocurrency is used to pay fees and provide governance on the platform.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Siacoin Logo
Sia is an affordable, blockchain-based cloud storage marketplace Sia is a decentralized cloud storage platform that requires no signups, no servers and no third party providers. Sia is completely private, and uses blockchain technology to encrypt and distribute all files stored there across a decentralized network. In order to store files, users must rent storage space using Siacoin (SC), a cryptocurrency that can also be mined and traded. Source
You can download theSiacoinlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Siacoin
item.description: Sia is an affordable, blockchain-based cloud storage marketplace Sia is a decentralized cloud storage platform that requires no signups, no servers and no third party providers. Sia is completely private, and uses blockchain technology to encrypt and distribute all files stored there across a decentralized network. In order to store files, users must rent storage space using Siacoin (SC), a cryptocurrency that can also be mined and traded. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 synthetix.io Logo
Synthetix is an alternative way to invest in fiat currencies, cryptocurrencies and commodities Synthetix is a decentralized protocol built on Ethereum that allows users to gain exposure to assets (cryptocurrencies, gold, stocks) without actually holding the underlying resource. These synthetic assets (Synths) are backed by the platform’s cryptocurrency, Synthetix Network Token (SNX), which is staked as collateral in order to generate rewards. Source
You can download theSynthetixlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Synthetix
item.description: Synthetix is an alternative way to invest in fiat currencies, cryptocurrencies and commodities Synthetix is a decentralized protocol built on Ethereum that allows users to gain exposure to assets (cryptocurrencies, gold, stocks) without actually holding the underlying resource. These synthetic assets (Synths) are backed by the platform’s cryptocurrency, Synthetix Network Token (SNX), which is staked as collateral in order to generate rewards. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Tezos Logo
Tezos is a decentralized, open-source blockchain network that can execute peer-to-peer transactions and serve as a platform for deploying smart contracts. The native cryptocurrency for the Tezos blockchain is the tez or tezzie, which has the symbol XTZ. As of January 2021, there are over 400 block validating nodes (bakers) on the Tezos network. The vast majority of transactions currently happening on Tezos today though are mostly to maintain consensus and are not for more substantive operations, such as executing smart contracts, even though the network has the capacity to handle many more transactions.
You can download theTezoslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Tezos
item.description: Tezos is a decentralized, open-source blockchain network that can execute peer-to-peer transactions and serve as a platform for deploying smart contracts. The native cryptocurrency for the Tezos blockchain is the tez or tezzie, which has the symbol XTZ. As of January 2021, there are over 400 block validating nodes (bakers) on the Tezos network. The vast majority of transactions currently happening on Tezos today though are mostly to maintain consensus and are not for more substantive operations, such as executing smart contracts, even though the network has the capacity to handle many more transactions.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
The Graph Logo
The Graph makes it possible to index and query data from blockchains With The Graph, anyone can build and publish open APIs, called subgraphs, that make data from blockchains easily accessible. The data from these subgraphs can then be transformed, organized and shared across decentralized applications (dapps) for anyone to query. GRT is the token that powers the economics of The Graph protocol. Source
You can download theThe Graphlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: The Graph
item.description: The Graph makes it possible to index and query data from blockchains With The Graph, anyone can build and publish open APIs, called subgraphs, that make data from blockchains easily accessible. The data from these subgraphs can then be transformed, organized and shared across decentralized applications (dapps) for anyone to query. GRT is the token that powers the economics of The Graph protocol. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
TRON Logo
TRON is a blockchain platform where developers can deploy their own decentralized apps (dapps) TRON is powered by delegated proof-of-stake (DPoS), allowing anyone who buys TRX to vote on who can earn rewards for validating transactions on the blockchain. TRON’s vision is to create a decentralized version of the internet. Check out the chart above to get historical and live TRON price data, then use the buy/sell button to start trading.
You can download theTRONlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: TRON
item.description: TRON is a blockchain platform where developers can deploy their own decentralized apps (dapps) TRON is powered by delegated proof-of-stake (DPoS), allowing anyone who buys TRX to vote on who can earn rewards for validating transactions on the blockchain. TRON’s vision is to create a decentralized version of the internet. Check out the chart above to get historical and live TRON price data, then use the buy/sell button to start trading.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Uniswap Logo
Uniswap is a decentralized cryptocurrency exchange which facilitates automated transactions between cryptocurrency tokens on the Ethereum blockchain through the use of smart contracts. As of October 2020, Uniswap is estimated to be the largest decentralized exchange and the fourth-largest cryptocurrency exchange overall by daily trading volume. Source
You can download theUniswaplogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Uniswap
item.description: Uniswap is a decentralized cryptocurrency exchange which facilitates automated transactions between cryptocurrency tokens on the Ethereum blockchain through the use of smart contracts. As of October 2020, Uniswap is estimated to be the largest decentralized exchange and the fourth-largest cryptocurrency exchange overall by daily trading volume. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Yearn Finance Logo
Yearn.Finance is a decentralized yield aggregator running on the Ethereum blockchain Cryptocurrency deposited on Yearn.Finance is automatically lended out at the highest lending rate possible across a number of other platforms. YFI is the token for Yearn Finance. Holders of YFI can participate in the protocol’s governance and earn a percentage of the fees generated on the various Yearn Finance products through staking. Source
You can download theYearnlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Yearn
item.description: Yearn.Finance is a decentralized yield aggregator running on the Ethereum blockchain Cryptocurrency deposited on Yearn.Finance is automatically lended out at the highest lending rate possible across a number of other platforms. YFI is the token for Yearn Finance. Holders of YFI can participate in the protocol’s governance and earn a percentage of the fees generated on the various Yearn Finance products through staking. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Kryptex Logo
The word cryptex is a neologism coined by the author Dan Brown for his 2003 novel The Da Vinci Code, denoting a portable vault used to hide secret messages. It is a word formed from Greek κρυπτός kryptós, “hidden, secret” and Latin codex; “an apt title for this device” since it uses “the science of cryptology to protect information written on the contained scroll or codex”. The first physical cryptex was created by Justin Kirk Nevins in 2004.
You can download theKryptexlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Kryptex
item.description: The word cryptex is a neologism coined by the author Dan Brown for his 2003 novel The Da Vinci Code, denoting a portable vault used to hide secret messages. It is a word formed from Greek κρυπτός kryptós, “hidden, secret” and Latin codex; “an apt title for this device” since it uses “the science of cryptology to protect information written on the contained scroll or codex”. The first physical cryptex was created by Justin Kirk Nevins in 2004.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
MinerGate Logo
MinerGate is one of the largest multicurrency mining pools, where users join resources to get a share of profits. The project was started in 2014 by a group of blockchain enthusiasts, led by Claude Lecomte. MinerGate operates with 10 coins and supports 4 major mining algorithms. Source
You can download theMinerGatelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: MinerGate
item.description: MinerGate is one of the largest multicurrency mining pools, where users join resources to get a share of profits. The project was started in 2014 by a group of blockchain enthusiasts, led by Claude Lecomte. MinerGate operates with 10 coins and supports 4 major mining algorithms. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Decred (DCR) Logo
Decred (DCR) is an open-source, community-based cryptocurrency, similar to Bitcoin. Decred was launched in February 2016 by the bitcoin developers that engineered btcsuite, an alternative full-node Bitcoin implementation written in the Go (golang) programming language and is used by development projects such as Ethereum, Factom, BitGo, OpenBazaar, and the Lightning Network. Source
You can download theDecredlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Decred
item.description: Decred (DCR) is an open-source, community-based cryptocurrency, similar to Bitcoin. Decred was launched in February 2016 by the bitcoin developers that engineered btcsuite, an alternative full-node Bitcoin implementation written in the Go (golang) programming language and is used by development projects such as Ethereum, Factom, BitGo, OpenBazaar, and the Lightning Network. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Dogecoin (DOGE) Logo
Dogecoin (DOGE, symbol: Ð and D) is a Litecoin-derived cryptocurrency featuring a Shiba Inu from the Doge Internet meme on its logo. The users themselves call it “joky”. One of the most popular uses of the coin is the reward of Internet users for interesting and quality content created or shared by them. It was introduced on December 8, 2013. Source
You can download theDogecoinlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Dogecoin
item.description: Dogecoin (DOGE, symbol: Ð and D) is a Litecoin-derived cryptocurrency featuring a Shiba Inu from the Doge Internet meme on its logo. The users themselves call it “joky”. One of the most popular uses of the coin is the reward of Internet users for interesting and quality content created or shared by them. It was introduced on December 8, 2013. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Exodus Wallet Logo
Exodus is a multi-cryptocurrency wallet that boasts an easy-to-use UI. You can keep your Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), DASH, Decred (DCR), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Bitcoin Gold (BTG) and Vertcoin (VTC), along with a continuously increasing number of Ethereum tokens, all in one place and easily calculate and organize your savings with their pie chart portfolio. Source
You can download theExoduslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Exodus
item.description: Exodus is a multi-cryptocurrency wallet that boasts an easy-to-use UI. You can keep your Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), DASH, Decred (DCR), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Bitcoin Gold (BTG) and Vertcoin (VTC), along with a continuously increasing number of Ethereum tokens, all in one place and easily calculate and organize your savings with their pie chart portfolio. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Iota (MIOTA) Logo
IOTA is an open-source distributed ledger (cryptocurrency) focused on providing secure communications and payments between machines on the Internet of Things. Using directed acyclic graph (DAG) technology instead of the traditional blockchain, IOTA’s transactions are free regardless of the size of the transaction, confirmations times are fast, the number of transactions the system can handle simultaneously is unlimited, and the system can easily scale. IOTA was founded in 2015 by David Sonstebo, Sergey Ivancheglo, Dominik Schiener, and Dr.
You can download theIotalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Iota
item.description: IOTA is an open-source distributed ledger (cryptocurrency) focused on providing secure communications and payments between machines on the Internet of Things. Using directed acyclic graph (DAG) technology instead of the traditional blockchain, IOTA’s transactions are free regardless of the size of the transaction, confirmations times are fast, the number of transactions the system can handle simultaneously is unlimited, and the system can easily scale. IOTA was founded in 2015 by David Sonstebo, Sergey Ivancheglo, Dominik Schiener, and Dr.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 NEM (XEM) Logo
NEM is a peer-to-peer blockchain platform for app developers. Its native cryptocurrency is the XEM. Its code was created from scratch in Java by the New Economy Movement (NEM), which seeks to build “a new economy based on the principles of financial freedom, decentralization, equality and solidarity”. Source
You can download theNEMlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: NEM
item.description: NEM is a peer-to-peer blockchain platform for app developers. Its native cryptocurrency is the XEM. Its code was created from scratch in Java by the New Economy Movement (NEM), which seeks to build “a new economy based on the principles of financial freedom, decentralization, equality and solidarity”. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 NEO (NEO) Logo
NEO (formerly known as Antshares) is a smart economy platform and the first Chinese blockchain project. The project was founded in 2014 and was a real-time open source on GitHub in June 2015. NEO coin and the platform aims to develop a “smart economy” with a distributed network by utilizing blockchain technology and digital identity to digitize assets and automating the management of digital assets using smart contracts. NEO coin is currently traded on Bittrex, Cryptopia and Binance among other exchanges.
You can download theNEOlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: NEO
item.description: NEO (formerly known as Antshares) is a smart economy platform and the first Chinese blockchain project. The project was founded in 2014 and was a real-time open source on GitHub in June 2015. NEO coin and the platform aims to develop a “smart economy” with a distributed network by utilizing blockchain technology and digital identity to digitize assets and automating the management of digital assets using smart contracts. NEO coin is currently traded on Bittrex, Cryptopia and Binance among other exchanges.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Waves Platform (WAVES) Logo
Waves Platform is a cryptocurrency project launched by the Russian entrepreneur Alexander Ivanov in 2016. The blockchain platform launch campaign raised $16 million, becoming one of the largest in terms of funds raised through crowdfunding. In June 2017, the Waves platform reported the integration of the dollar payment gateway into the Lite Client, which allows users of the wallet to replenish the account in US dollars. Source
You can download theWaveslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

In June 2017, the Waves platform reported the integration of the dollar payment gateway into the Lite Client, which allows users of the wallet to replenish the account in US dollars. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Circle Logo
Circle is a peer-to-peer payments technology company. It was founded by Jeremy Allaire and Sean Neville in October 2013. Circle’s mobile payment platform, Circle Pay, allows users to hold, send, and receive traditional fiat currencies . In September 2015, Circle received the first BitLicense issued from the New York State Department of Financial Services. In April 2016, the British government approved the first virtual currency licensure to Circle. Circle is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts.
You can download theCirclelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

Circle’s mobile payment platform, Circle Pay, allows users to hold, send, and receive traditional fiat currencies . In September 2015, Circle received the first BitLicense issued from the New York State Department of Financial Services. In April 2016, the British government approved the first virtual currency licensure to Circle. Circle is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Coinbase Logo
Coinbase is a digital currency exchange headquartered in San Francisco, California. They broker exchanges of Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Ethereum Classic, and Litecoin with fiat currencies in approximately 32 countries, and bitcoin transactions and storage in 190 countries worldwide. Source
You can download theCoinbaselogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Coinomi Logo
Coinomi – is one of the first, and most trusted, cryptocurrency multiwallets. Coinomi is a non-custodial multiwallet and your private keys are stored securely encrypted on your device at all times. The wallet is available on all platforms and the only official download sources are listed on the Coinomi website. Coinomi currently supports more than 125 blockchains and has FULL support for all Ethereum Tokens. Source
You can download theCoinomilogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Dash (DASH) Logo
Dash is an open source cryptocurrency and is a form of decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) run by a subset of users, called “masternodes”. It is an altcoin that was forked from the Bitcoin protocol. The currency permits fast transactions that can be untraceable. Source
You can download theDashlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Dash
item.description: Dash is an open source cryptocurrency and is a form of decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) run by a subset of users, called “masternodes”. It is an altcoin that was forked from the Bitcoin protocol. The currency permits fast transactions that can be untraceable. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 EOS (EOS) Logo
EOS.IO is a blockchain protocol powered by the native cryptocurrency EOS. The smart contract platform claims to eliminate transaction fees and also conduct millions of transactions per second. Source
You can download theEOSlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: EOS
item.description: EOS.IO is a blockchain protocol powered by the native cryptocurrency EOS. The smart contract platform claims to eliminate transaction fees and also conduct millions of transactions per second. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Ethereum (ETH) Logo
Ethereum is an open source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform and operating system featuring smart contract (scripting) functionality. It supports a modified version of Nakamoto consensus via transaction-based state transitions. Ether is a cryptocurrency generated by the Ethereum platform and used to compensate mining nodes for computations performed. Each Ethereum account has an ether balance and ether may be transferred from one account to another. Source
You can download theEthereumlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Ethereum
item.description: Ethereum is an open source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform and operating system featuring smart contract (scripting) functionality. It supports a modified version of Nakamoto consensus via transaction-based state transitions. Ether is a cryptocurrency generated by the Ethereum platform and used to compensate mining nodes for computations performed. Each Ethereum account has an ether balance and ether may be transferred from one account to another. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Ethereum Classic (ETC) Logo
Ethereum Classic is an open-source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform featuring smart contract (scripting) functionality. It provides a decentralized Turing-complete virtual machine, the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), which can execute scripts using an international network of public nodes. Ethereum Classic and Ethereum have a value token called “ether”, which can be transferred between participants, stored in a cryptocurrency wallet and is used to compensate participant nodes for computations performed in the Ethereum Platform.
You can download theEthereum Classiclogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Ethereum Classic
item.description: Ethereum Classic is an open-source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform featuring smart contract (scripting) functionality. It provides a decentralized Turing-complete virtual machine, the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM), which can execute scripts using an international network of public nodes. Ethereum Classic and Ethereum have a value token called “ether”, which can be transferred between participants, stored in a cryptocurrency wallet and is used to compensate participant nodes for computations performed in the Ethereum Platform.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Huobi token Logo
Huobi (Chinese: 火币网; pinyin: Huǒbìwǎng) is a Singapore-based cryptocurrency exchange. Founded in China, the company now has offices in Hong Kong, Korea, Japan and the United States. In August 2018 it became a publicly listed Hong Kong company. Source
You can download theHuobilogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Litecoin (LTC) Logo
Litecoin (LTC or Ł) is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency and open-source software project released under the MIT/X11 license. Creation and transfer of coins is based on an open source cryptographic protocol and is not managed by any central authority.[citation needed] Litecoin was an early bitcoin spinoff or altcoin, starting in October 2011. In technical details, litecoin is nearly identical to Bitcoin. Source
You can download theLitecoinlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Litecoin
item.description: Litecoin (LTC or Ł) is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency and open-source software project released under the MIT/X11 license. Creation and transfer of coins is based on an open source cryptographic protocol and is not managed by any central authority.[citation needed] Litecoin was an early bitcoin spinoff or altcoin, starting in October 2011. In technical details, litecoin is nearly identical to Bitcoin. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Monero (XMR) Logo
Monero is an open-source cryptocurrency created in April 2014 that focuses on fungibility, privacy and decentralization. Monero uses an obfuscated public ledger, meaning anybody can broadcast or send transactions, but no outside observer can tell the source, amount or destination. Monero uses a Proof of Work mechanism to issue new coins and incentivize miners to secure the network and validate transactions. Source
You can download theMonerologo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Monero
item.description: Monero is an open-source cryptocurrency created in April 2014 that focuses on fungibility, privacy and decentralization. Monero uses an obfuscated public ledger, meaning anybody can broadcast or send transactions, but no outside observer can tell the source, amount or destination. Monero uses a Proof of Work mechanism to issue new coins and incentivize miners to secure the network and validate transactions. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Ripple XRP (XRP) Logo
Ripple is a real-time gross settlement system, currency exchange and remittance network created by Ripple Labs Inc., a US-based technology company. Released in 2012, Ripple is built upon a distributed open source protocol, and supports tokens representing fiat currency, cryptocurrency, commodities, or other units of value such as frequent flier miles or mobile minutes. Ripple purports to enable “secure, instantly and nearly free global financial transactions of any size with no chargebacks.
You can download theRipplelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Ripple
item.description: Ripple is a real-time gross settlement system, currency exchange and remittance network created by Ripple Labs Inc., a US-based technology company. Released in 2012, Ripple is built upon a distributed open source protocol, and supports tokens representing fiat currency, cryptocurrency, commodities, or other units of value such as frequent flier miles or mobile minutes. Ripple purports to enable “secure, instantly and nearly free global financial transactions of any size with no chargebacks.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Stellar (XLM) Logo
Stellar is an open source, decentralized protocol for digital currency to fiat money transfers which allows cross-border transactions between any pair of currencies. The Stellar protocol is supported by a 501(c)3 nonprofit, the Stellar Development Foundation. Source
You can download theStellarlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Stellar

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Tether (USDT) Logo
Tether is a controversial cryptocurrency with tokens issued by Tether Limited. It formerly claimed that each token was backed by one United States dollar, but on 14 March 2019 changed the backing to include loans to affiliate companies. The Bitfinex exchange was accused by the New York Attorney General of using Tether’s funds to cover up $850 million in funds missing since mid-2018. Source
You can download theTetherlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Tether
item.description: Tether is a controversial cryptocurrency with tokens issued by Tether Limited. It formerly claimed that each token was backed by one United States dollar, but on 14 March 2019 changed the backing to include loans to affiliate companies. The Bitfinex exchange was accused by the New York Attorney General of using Tether’s funds to cover up $850 million in funds missing since mid-2018. Source

 Zcash (ZEC) Logo
Zcash is a cryptocurrency aimed at using cryptography to provide enhanced privacy for its users compared to other cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Libra Logo
About Libra Libra is a new global cryptocurrency. Libra is built on a secure, scalable, and reliable blockchain and is designed to help bring people everywhere equal access to financial services. Libra is backed by a reserve of assets so that its value stays stable. Libra is reinventing money so it can be used in countries around the world. It can easily be sent to anyone and exchanged into local currencies.
You can download theLibralogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

Libra is built on a secure, scalable, and reliable blockchain and is designed to help bring people everywhere equal access to financial services. Libra is backed by a reserve of assets so that its value stays stable. Libra is reinventing money so it can be used in countries around the world. It can easily be sent to anyone and exchanged into local currencies.
